text: HI <@U033VNNBBBP>, we are a certified HubSpot Gold solution partner, happy to help you build the integration with Showpad, please let me know a good time to talk, looking forward to hearing form you.

Hello everyone,
just bumped into a random typo here:
`...whether the module is renders anything.`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context#usage-within-custom-modules>

Looking to connect with more like minded folk who love HubSpot if you're a dev, designer, data structure implementor etc. feel free to drop is a connection request on LinkedIn as I'm looking to expand my network in the HubSpot space this year.

If you put out regular HubSpot content that's a +1 as I love to have a read outside of work and see what other people are shouting about, maybe learn a thing or two here or there as well!

<https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-d-vickers/>
Hey Dan! Welcome to the community :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks <@UQNEXHW14> I've been in here a while but finally reaching out to the wider community to say hello!
This has been reported! Thanks so much!
